mapper.select: /* 가압펌프 매출기준 자료 조회 */ SELECT T1.CNTR_NO --계약번호 , T1.CNTR_SN --계약일련번호 , T3.PD_NM -- 상품명 , T1.ADN_SV_CS_AMT --매출금액 , CASE WHEN T1.IST_DT = 0 THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.IST_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD') END AS IST_DT -- 설치일자 , CASE WHEN T1.REQD_DT = 0 THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.REQD_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD') END AS REQD_DT -- 철거일자 , T2.MPY_BSDT -- 이체일자 , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'DP_TP_CD', DP_TP_CD) AS DP_TP_CD -- 이체구분 , CASE WHEN T22.COPN_DV_CD = '1' THEN '개인 ' ELSE '법인 ' END AS COPN_DV_CD -- 개인/법인 , CASE WHEN T21.ALNCMP_CD = '17' THEN '상조 ' ELSE '' END AS ALNCMP_CD -- 상조제휴 , (SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'ALNC_STAT_TP_CD', ALNC_STAT_TP_CD) FROM TB_SSCT_ACMPAL_CNTR_IZ WHERE BASE_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO) AS ALNC_STAT_TP_CD -- 제휴상태 , CASE WHEN T5.PRM_MCN > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END AS LCPGUB -- 선납여부 , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(T5.SL_RCOG_DT,0,6) = T5.SL_CL_YM THEN T5.EOT_ATAM ELSE 0 END AS LCAM36 -- 선수금 , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(T5.SL_RCOG_DT,0,6) = T5.SL_CL_YM AND T5.EOT_ATAM > 0 THEN T5.CNTR_PTRM ELSE 0 END AS LCMON1 -- 렌탈기간 , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(T5.SL_RCOG_DT,0,6) = T5.SL_CL_YM AND T5.EOT_ATAM > 0 THEN T5.RENTAL_AMT ELSE 0 END AS LCAMT1 -- 렌탈료 , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(T5.SL_RCOG_DT,0,6) = T5.SL_CL_YM AND T5.EOT_ATAM > 0 THEN T5.RENTAL_DSC_AMT ELSE 0 END AS LCRAM1 -- 렌탈할인 FROM TB_SSCT_RENTAL_ADN_SV_IZ T1 --렌탈부가서비스내역 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_RENTAL_ADN_SV_IZ LC70 --렌탈부가서비스내역 ON LC70.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND LC70.ADN_SV_SN = T1.ADN_SV_SN AND LC70.ADN_SV_SN = ( SELECT ADN_SV_SN FROM TB_SSCT_RENTAL_ADN_SV_IZ WHERE CNTR_NO = LC70.CNTR_NO AND ADN_SV_DV_CD = 01 ORDER BY ADN_SV_SN DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) LEFT JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS T2 --계약결제기본 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_STLM_ID = ( SELECT CNTR_STLM_ID FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL B WHERE T2.CNTR_NO = B.DTL_CNTR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SUBSTR(B.VL_STRT_DTM,1,6) <= #{slYm} AND SUBSTR(B.VL_END_DTM,1,6) >= #{slYm} ORDER BY SUBSTR(B.VL_END_DTM,1,6) DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) LEFT JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T21 --계약상세 ON T21.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T21.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN LEFT JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T22 --계약기본 ON T22.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T3 --상품기본 ON T1.PDCT_PD_CD = T3.PD_CD LEFT JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T5 --매출월마감_WELLS ON T1.CNTR_NO = T5.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T5.CNTR_SN AND T5.SL_CL_YM = #{slYm} ORDER BY T1.CNTR_NO
